Html:
Hi I'm New to CodePlex and I have just downloaded the Beta1 Club Starter Kit. I thought it would load like the Microsoft Clubsite Starter Kit when I selected a new project. Can anyone advise me as to what steps I need to do to set up the site and make it work with VS 2005 using SQL 2005 or SQL 2000 standard not express?


Thanks,

I would wait until Wednesday when we release Beta 2 with the SQL Scripts. We will probably not get the VS plugin until the official 2.0 release.

Thanks
Zack

Do the SQL Script files need to be uploaded in sequence? Srcipt1..Script2..etc?

My GoDaddy account just does not like to cooperate when it comes to Uploading the SQL script using their Web Tool...
BTW it is an EMPTY DB..no tables, Sproc, etc...
It gives me error: Script1

Invalid object name 'sys.foreign_keys'.

?????

Thanks
Mike
Hmmmm.... I can put up a new version. Sorry about this, I totally expected the SQL scripts to run correctly. The correct scripts are on the release page.
And you'll need to do schema.sql first then data.sql.
